prompts: Create a poison-type Pokemon with a round, bulbous body and a mix of green and purple colors.
Imagine a creature that emits toxic gas, featuring a large, puffy shape and quirky facial expressions.
Generate an eerie Pokemon that thrives in polluted environments, adorned with unusual markings and colors.
Show me a whimsical Pokemon that floats above the ground, surrounded by swirling clouds of toxic fumes.
Design a unique Pokemon that has multiple heads and a distinct, colorful appearance, suited for a dark forest.
Give me a Pokemon that represents pollution, with a fluffy body and a mischievous personality in urban settings.
Make a creature that embodies toxic waste, with bright yellow accents and a double-bodied form.
